TextBlock.Text: ALNUS: I found this interesting looking stone on this planet, so I decided to place it in this building.
ALNUS: I just put the stone here Adonsonia, how did you already steal it?
ADONSONIA: That actually was not me. I recall a story with a stone like this, apparently they move when unobserved.
BETULA: That is quite an interesting trait!

ADONSONIA: It gets better. Supposedly it is possible to ride one of these stones to other locations, provided you can get that location to be in absolute darkness. If anyone else would like to join me, I might see if I can find some way to trigger this behavior.
ALNUS: I would accuse you of lying, if the stone didn't just appear behind me and nearly cause cardiac arrest.
